message.entry: Invalid data type. First and second arguments must be numeric.
Incorrect number of input arguments. Each parameter name must be followed by a corresponding value.
Invalid input combination. Specify either a tolerance level or the relative or absolute tolerance values.
One or more values in the input are too large for approximate equality to be calculated without a loss of precision.
Absolute tolerance must be a finite, real, nonnegative, double or single value.
Relative tolerance must be a finite, real, nonnegative, double or single value, strictly less than one.
